thread.title: Selena Gomez schedules Smoothie King Center show for June 14
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez schedules Smoothie King Center show for June 14

title: Selena Gomez schedules Smoothie King Center show for June 14
text:
Selena Gomez schedules Smoothie King Center show for June 14 Selena Gomez schedules Smoothie King Center show for June 14 ADVOCATE STAFF REPORT Comments Associated Press file photoSelena Gomez 
Pop singing star Selena Gomez will bring her “Revival” tour to the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans on June 14. 
The 41-city North American tour opens May 6 in Las Vegas. Stops will include the major markets New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago, Boston, Dallas, Toronto, Montreal and Vancouver. International dates will be announced later. 
“Revival” tour tickets go on sale at 10 a.m. Saturday, October 17 via Ticketmaster.com . 
The tour will follow the Friday, Oct. 9 release of Gomez’s latest album “Revival.” The album’s first single, “Good For You,” recently topped the Top 40 radio charts for three consecutive weeks. 
Gomez, 23, has sold more than over 22 million singles worldwide. The “Revival” tour is her first since the sold-out 2013 “Stars Dance Tour.” Get The Advocate in your inbox
